::Astral::

Astral looks up from admiring their work, looking to Wheeljack. "Wanna
go fight at the battle, or is there more to do here?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/The Galactors::
> 
> Zardus watches the scanners report that the bots had gone to the
> Maximal base, and were now waiting outside. He frowns. He didn't
want
> the Maximals destroyed, though he doubted that they would be. Either
> way, though, a small token of help would improve his dealings with
> them greatly.
> 
> "Alliance members," he says over the comm, "The battle is at the
> Maximal base. We're going to help the Maximals out this time, so
fire
> on anyone firing at you unless the Maximals open fire on us. In that
> case, we'll blow them to scrap."
> 
> He motions for the Galactors to follow him and then looks at Havoc.
> "Wait here in case Wolfgang wakes up. I should be back soon."
> 
> Motioning for the Galactors to follow, he walks out of the CR room,
> heading for the exit. Him and the Galactors exit the base and take
> off, the shields flickering off for them as they pass through and
fly
> toward the CF. Zardus looks behind him, checking to see if anyone
was
> following, as they should be.
